QuestData.Title: Blood in the Surf
QuestData.Description: These naga scum think to move upriver to reinforce the Bastion of Twilight. We will RIP off their fish heads and PULL OUT their SPINES.$B$B<Gralok drives his broadsword into the dirt.>$B$BDestroy the Blackscale!
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay any combination of 15 Blackscale Raiders or Blackscale Mistresses.
QuestData.CompletionText: After the battle we will mount their heads on pikes and build a wall all along the beach. THAT will show these belly-crawling SNAKES who owns the Highlands.
QuestData.RewardText: <Gralok sizes you up.>$B$BYou're a true fighter, $n. I liked watching you work. Perhaps the Dragonmaw really DO belong in your Horde.
